snippet: The Arkansas attacks included a fire at an electrical substation and attempts to down a support tower using moving trains.
abstract: Federal authorities arrest Jason Woodring of Arkansas in connection with a series of attacks on the power grid east of Little Rock.
lead_paragraph: The Arkansas attacks included a fire at an electrical substation and attempts to down a support tower using moving trains.

headline.main: Arrest in Attacks on Power Grid
headline.print_headline: Arrest in Attacks On Power Grid
